title: Bug 124066: 'Insert Chart' not translated in Chinese context menu
description: Bug 124066 reports that in the context menu, 'Insert Chart' is not translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is displayed in English.
EB: Expected behavior: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option should be translated into Chinese.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to a layout.
2. Right-click to bring up the context menu.
3. Observe that the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
